headline: Dropped Docker Desktop for Colima and loving it
description:
It has been a few months, but I totally adopted Colima. Tearing down a docker instance (Colima delete) and starting a new one (Colima start) takes (less than) a minute and it’s brilliant for local testing. Everything else I tried is supported, mostly Compose with volumes.

I’m very inclined to start my own CLI or Chromium based desktop taskbar for Colima (although now back on the commandline enjoying it as much). Is there such a project?

Thank you Colima creators and contributors. You rock!

Colima on github: https://github.com/abiosoft/colima
headline_zh-Hans: 弃用Docker Desktop，改用Colima，并爱上了它
headline_zh-Hant: 棄用Docker Desktop，改用Colima，並愛上了它
description_zh-Hans:
已经过去几个月了，但我完全采用了科利马。拆除一个docker实例（Colima delete）并启动一个新的实例（Colima start）只需要（不到）一分钟，这对于本地测试来说是非常棒的。

我非常倾向于为Colima启动我自己的CLI或基于Chromium的桌面任务栏（尽管现在回到命令行上也很喜欢它）。 有这样一个项目吗？

感谢Colima的创造者和贡献者。你们真了不起！

Colima在github上：https://github.com/abiosoft/colima
